modName: UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul with Armored Horses
summary: adds armor to the eight horses
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/1529766-1334887664.jpg[/img]

Name: UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul with Armored Horses
Version: 1.0f_h
Author: fLokii/Clintster74 
[color=red][size=6]I take no credit for the UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul Mod[/size][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]

With permission from “flokii” and “mystikhybrid” (for the horse armor mesh).

        [img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/1529766-1334887771.jpg[/img]

[color=red][size=6]Update to 1.2f.HA[/size][/color]
This updates to fLokii\'s 1.2f. Just copy and paste the new .esp if you are updateing from a older version, if it your first install copy and paste the .esp, meshes and textures folders to your data folder. If your followers are on there horses when you up date you may need to fast travle, or enter and then exit a cell to get the armor to show up.
flokii has removed the follow package so I set the horse speed from 100 to 150 to stop them from lagging so far behind.

[color=red][size=6]Requirements for V1.2f:[/size][/color]
1.	A legal copy of Skyrim patched to 1.6.89.0
2.	Flokii’s UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]UFO[/url]

 

[color=red][size=6]Update to 1.2A.HA[/size][/color]
This updates to fLokii\'s 1.2A. Just copy and paste the new .esp if you are updateing from a older version, if it your first install copy and paste the .esp, meshes and textures folders to your data folder. If your followers are on there horses when you up date you may need to fast travle, or enter and then exit a cell to get the armor to show up. 


[color=red][size=6]Update to 1.1B.HA[/size][/color]
This updates to fLokii\'s 1.1B. Just copy and paste the new .esp if you are updateing from 1.1A_HA, if it your first install copy and paste the .esp, meshes and textures folders to your data folder.

[color=red][size=6]Update to 1.1A_HA[/size][/color]
This updates to fLokii\'s 1.1A just copy and paste the new .esp if you are updateing from 1.1.h, if it your first install copy and paste the .esp, meshes and textures folders to your data folder.

[color=red][size=6]Update to 1.1H[/size][/color]
This updates to fLokii\'s 1.1 just copy and paste the new .esp if you are updateing from 1.0H.h, if it your first install copy and paste the .esp, meshes and textures folders to your data folder.

[color=blue][size=6]Description[/size][/color]
This is a add-on/replacement .esp for [color=yellow]fLokii’s[/color] outstanding UFO mod. I have retextured ‘mystikhybrid’s” leather horse armor, and made a few small adjustments to UFO.
1.	Adds horse armor to each of the eight follower horse, each with their own armor
2.	Renames each of the follower horses from horse to Companion Horse.
3.	Sets their confidence from “cowardly”  to “average” (this seems to help them from running off in a fight)
4.	Set them to “Essential”
5.	Set there follow package from 600.0000 – 1000.0000 to 500.0000 – 800.0000 this stop them from lagging so far behind and getting lost.

[color=red][size=6]Requirements:[/size][/color]
1.	A legal copy of Skyrim patched to 1.5.26 
2.	Flokii’s UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]UFO[/url]
[color=green]Installation:[/color]
1.	Download and install UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul per the instructions for that mod 
2.	Copy and paste the .esp and the meshes and textures folders from UFO-armored horses to your Skyrim data folder. And allow for overwrite.
If the armor does not show up on the on any of the horse in your follower party then fast travel and the armor will show up.

[color=orange][size=6]uninstall:[/size][/color]
Remove or replace the .esp if replacing, replace with the origin UFO .esp. Remove UFO folder from your Skyrim/data/meshes and from Skyrim/data/textures.
   
[color=red][size=6]Notes[/size][/color]
Please direct all questions about the UFO mod to its page. And leave comments concerning the horse armor and the changes to the horses AI on this page.

[color=green][size=6]Credits:[/size][/color]
 fLokii: 
For UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]UFO[/url]
mystikhybrid:
 For Horse Armors for Skyrim found hear
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13348]Hors Armor[/url] 
New horse armor textures by me 
[color=orange][size=6]Thanks to:[/size][/color]
Bethesda, for another grate game
The nexus sites the best place to share mods.
Tools used:
CK
Photo shop CS5
Gimp
Nifscope
Legal and Licensing:
You must get permission form:
fLokii:
For use of his mod UFO- Ultimate Follower Overhaul 
mystikhybrid:
For use of the Horse Armors meshes
My textures are free to use just give me credit for them and please send a link to your mod.
Thanks for looking
author: fLokii_Clintster74
